advisory.description: Nachi Ueno (NTT PF lab), Rohit Karajgi (Vertex) and Venkatesan Ravikumar (HP) discovered a vulnerability in Nova API nodes handling of incoming requests. An authenticated user may craft malicious commands to affect resources on tenants he is not a member of, potentially leading to incorrect billing, quota escaping or compromise of computing resources created by a third-party. Only setups allowing the OpenStack API are affected.
advisory.title: Tenant bypass by authenticated users using OpenStack API
